trans-unit.source: Specifies how to synchronize a directory within a domain.
trans-unit.target: Angir Slik synkroniserer du en mappe innenfor et domene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object with a cookie.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"> </xref> objekt med en informasjonskapsel.

trans-unit.source: A Byte data type object that specifies the directory synchronization search cookie.
trans-unit.target: En Byte typen dataobjektet som angir søkeinformasjonskapselen directory-synkronisering.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object with a directory synchronization object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"> </xref> objekt med en mappe synkroniseringsobjekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> data type object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"> </xref> objekt av typen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object with a directory synchronization option.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"> </xref> objekt med et alternativ for directory-synkronisering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"></xref> data type object that specifies how a directory synchronization search is performed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"> </xref> typen dataobjektet som angir hvordan en Active directory-synkronisering Søk utføres.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object with a directory synchronization option and cookie.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"> </xref> objekt med en directory synchronization alternativet og informasjonskapsel.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"></xref> data type object that specifies how a directory synchronization search is performed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"> </xref> typen dataobjektet som angir hvordan en Active directory-synkronisering Søk utføres.

trans-unit.source: A Byte data type object that specifies the directory synchronization search cookie.
trans-unit.target: En Byte typen dataobjektet som angir søkeinformasjonskapselen directory-synkronisering.

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en kopi av gjeldende <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the directory synchronization search cookie.
trans-unit.target: Henter søkeinformasjonskapselen directory-synkronisering.

trans-unit.source: The returned search results must be enumerated before the cookie can be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Returnerte søkeresultatene må brukes før informasjonskapselen kan hentes.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code example [Taking a Snapshot for a Later DirSync Search](http://msdn.microsoft.com/msdnmag/issues/05/12/DirectoryServices/default.aspx?loc=&fig=true).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se kodeeksemplet [tar et øyeblikksbilde for senere DirSync Søk](http://msdn.microsoft.com/msdnmag/issues/05/12/DirectoryServices/default.aspx?loc=&fig=true).

trans-unit.source: The directory synchronization search cookie object.
trans-unit.target: Den directory Søk informasjonskapsel synkroniseringsobjekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the options for the directory synchronization search.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir alternativene for Active directory-synkronisering søk.

trans-unit.source: The options that can be used with this property are found in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Alternativene som kan brukes med denne egenskapen finnes i den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions>opplisting.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Resetss the directory synchronization search cookie.
trans-unit.target: Resetss søkeinformasjonskapselen directory-synkronisering.

trans-unit.source: Resets the directory synchronization search cookie.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller søkeinformasjonskapselen directory-synkronisering.

trans-unit.source: A Byte data type object that contains a directory synchronization search cookie.
trans-unit.target: Et Byte dataobjekt av typen som inneholder søkeinformasjonskapselen en directory-synkronisering.

trans-unit.source: This method resets the cookie for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object instance to this value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilbakestiller informasjonskapselen for denne <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"> </xref> objektforekomsten til denne verdien.
